data.name: access_control
data.marketing: Allows site administrators to change required access levels for specific tasks. This changes what appears in the Jomres main menu and which tasks can be reached directly.
data.description: Allows site administrators to change required access levels for specific tasks. This changes what appears in the Jomres main menu and which tasks can be reached directly.
data.change_log: v1.1 changed how the new_level access level is sanitised as the previous method was converting negative figures to zero. v1.2 Added french lang file. v1.3 Italian language file added, thanks Nicola v1.4 Language files updated v1.5 Language files updated
data.author: Vince Wooll
